title: [Admission] Is PAN card mandatory for students?
content: Is PAN card of students compulsory for BTech admission through kcet?

comments.body: sortof , they will open an union bank account for you to deposit scholarship money , if you get it
u cn tell them that u. will submit it later , get it done quickly cuz ig before ESA u need to have an union bank account.

No no..
Even though I took my apn card and went, no one asked for it
Yes they will ask for it for scholarships purposes a few days after the classes start.
they did not necessarily ask, but I had it made tho
